<template>
  <v_edit id="pop"  :dynamicEdits="dynamicEdits"></v_edit>
</template>
<script>

import v_edit from "@c/dynamicSearch/dynamic_Search";

import vTable from "@c/tables/table";
import vSearch from "@c/dynamicSearch/dynamic_Search";
import AreaApi from "../../DictModule/webapi/AreaApi";
import DataApi from "../../DictModule/webapi/DataApi";
import MatlApi from "../../MatlModule/webapi/MaterialsApi";
import ReportApi from "../webapi/ReportApi";
import moment from "moment";
import config from "@/config/index";
import { pageTool } from "@/js/util.js";
export default {
  data() {
    var _ = this;
    return {
      formData: {
        No: "", //编号
        Name: "", //名称
        Code: "", //编码
        MnenonicCode: "" //助记码
      },
      dynamicEdits: [
        {
          type: "v_text",
          title: "发货单号1",
          key: "receiptno"
        },
        {
          type: "v_text",
          title: "批次号",
          key: "batchno"
        },
        {
          type: "br",
          key: "bra"
        },
        {
          type: "v_datetime",
          title: "发货开始日期",
          key: "sendstartdate",
          //defdate: moment(new Date()).add(-1, 'months').format("YYYY-MM-DD")
        },
        {
          type: "v_datetime",
          title: "发货结束日期",
          key: "sendenddate"
        },
        {
          type: "br",
          key: "bra"
        },
        {
          type: "v_singleSelect",
          title: "选择产品",
          key: "materialsid",
          apiUrl: MatlApi.GetMaterialsList,
          //params: { aaa: "fff" },
          selectkey: "productId",
          selectvalue: "productName"
        },
        {
          type: "br",
          key: "bra"
        },
        {
          type: "v_doubleSelect",
          key: "sendprovincecity",
          list: [
            {
              type: "v_singleSelect",
              title: "发货省份",
              key: "sendprovince",
              apiUrl: AreaApi.GetAllProvinceList,
              selectkey: "provinceid",
              selectvalue: "provincename",
              childrenkey: "sendcity"
            },
            {
              type: "v_singleSelect",
              title: "发货城市",
              key: "sendcity",
              apiUrl: AreaApi.GetCityOfProvinceList,
              parendPostKey: "AreaId",
              selectkey: "cityid",
              selectvalue: "cityname"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          type: "br",
          key: "bra"
        },
        {
          type: "v_doubleSelect",
          key: "sendlevelunit",
          list: [
            {
              type: "v_singleSelect",
              title: "发货层级",
              key: "sendlevel",
              apiUrl: DataApi.GetSendUnitLevelList,
              selectkey: "dataid",
              selectvalue: "dataname",
              childrenkey: "sendunit"
            },
            {
              type: "v_singleSelect",
              title: "发货单位",
              key: "sendunit",
              apiUrl: DataApi.GetSendOutWareHoustList,
              parendPostKey: "CatagoryId",
              selectkey: "id",
              selectvalue: "name"
            }
          ]
        }
        
      ],
      searchOptions: {
        // 忽略
        requiredCondition: true
      },
    };
  },
  computed: {
    exportOptions: function() {
      return {
        id: this.tableOption.tableId,
        name: this.tableOption.tableName,
        url: ReportApi.OutWareHoustReportExport
      };
    }
  },
  mounted: function() {
    // api.ppp({}).then(res => {
    //   console.log(res);
    // });
    var _ = this;
    _.$refs.table.tableObj.on("click", "a", function() {
      //_.editModel();
    });
  },
  methods: {
    search: function(params) {
      //debugger;
      //this.initValidate();
      this.$refs.table.tableOption.url =
        config.pgyerApiUrl + ReportApi.OutWareHoustReportPage.options.url;
      this.$refs.table.tableOption.params = params;
      this.$refs.table.operation("refresh");
    },
    iframecallback: function() {

    }
  },
  components: { vTable, vSearch, v_edit }
};
</script>
